timeline.message:
RULE (Java) Asserts should not be used to check the parameters of a public method

Make changes to conform to this rule
Update MarkerUtilities.java
Add proper regex input to ExtractWordsFromTextPlugin; refactor some code.
first set of public fields made private
Merge branch 'master-nb11' into public-fields
more public fields made private
Merge branch 'master-nb11' into public-fields

Merge pull request #297 from constellation-app/master-nb11

Upgrade master to NB 11 JDK 11

:memo: Update greetings

* Removed the reference to point to master-nb11 now that it's been merged.

RULE (Java) Assignments should not be made from within sub-expressions

Made changes to conform to the rule

New run_plugins service; ExtractWordsFromTextPlugin updated.

Multiple plugins can be run serially or in parallel. The Python
client has been updated to match.

I used ExtractWordsFromTextPlugin to test the new service,
so I updated it along the way.
Merge branch 'master-nb11' into master-nb11-rest-service
more public fields made private
Increase the default sphere size and add some random blazes.

Merge pull request #370 from constellation-app/sphere-tidy

Increase the default sphere size and add some random blazes.

Merge pull request #367 from constellation-app/RULE-(Java)-Assignments-should-not-be-made-from-within-sub-expressions

RULE (Java) Assignments should not be made from within sub-expressions

Merge pull request #371 from constellation-app/master-nb11

Master nb11

Merge pull request #361 from constellation-app/RULE-(Java)-Asserts-should-not-be-used-to-check-the-parameters-of-a-public-method

Rule (java) asserts should not be used to check the parameters of a public method
REST API calls now have no delay; new Sleep* plugins for testing REST calls; REST server tidying.
Merge branch 'master' into master-nb11-rest-service
Fix stupid CONSTANT name.
Fixed a parameter name.
Sonar fixes.
:memo: Remove reference to master-nb11
:art: Minor formatting improvement
:memo: Minor wording improvement
:memo: Minor wording update regarding NB 11
finished fixing public fields problem
Merge branch 'master' into public-fields
Update to ZoneDateTimeAxis
static calls now call from base class
fixed some sonar rules missed in previous PRs
replaced multiple catches with either multi-catch or removed need for a catch
removed static modifier from enums

:green_heart: Stale detection action workflow

Add a stale detection action workflow that will run once a day. With the growing number of issue and PRs we need to keep on top of them and make sure we don't let them hang around forever or be forgotten about.

This is a very lenient numbers and hopefully we don't see this too often!

Merge pull request #382 from constellation-app/public-fields

Public fields

Merge pull request #383 from constellation-app/RULE---Java-Return-values-from-functions-without-side-effects-should-not-be-ignored

RULE - Java Return values from functions without side effects should not be ignored

Merge pull request #384 from constellation-app/static-base-class

Static Related Fixes

Merge pull request #385 from constellation-app/feature/stale-workflow

Stale detection action workflow

Merge pull request #368 from constellation-app/master-nb11-rest-service

Master nb11 rest service
added missing lang attibute to html tag
added missing tags
added captions to tables
added th tags to tables
added missing scope attributes from th tags
Merge branch 'master' into Layers_view-NB11

Merge pull request #392 from constellation-app/html-bugs

Html bugs
Merge branch 'Layers_view-NB11' of https://github.com/constellation-app/constellation into Layers_view-NB11

:art: added layer limit to add layers button
:art: cleaned up StoreGraph
Merge branch 'master' into Layers_view-NB11
:art: fixed an import

timeline.bodyText: Don't know where I was going on this section of code. Cheers
timeline.author: aldebaran30701

replies.bodyText: It looked like you'd separated it out to support debug print statements.
replies.author: cygnus-x-1

replies.bodyText: There were a few parts I did do that. But I think this was a case of coding before coffee. 😆
replies.author: aldebaran30701

timeline.bodyText: I'll merge in some code that removes this. The functionality of >= can be achieved by checking the query with > || =.
timeline.author: aldebaran30701

timeline.bodyText: The only reason it is checked here is so that when the element bitmask is changed, it doesn't re-update the bitmask and get called numerous times.
timeline.author: aldebaran30701
aldebaran30701
